title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it fails to take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in it taking focus.
EB: Clicking on the first Combo should result in it taking focus.
SR: Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus switches to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
